means: 抵押( mortgage的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Two-thirds of householders in this country live in a mortgaged home.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国2/3的屋主住在抵押贷款买来的房子里。

sentence.Network_en: James was over-drawn and mortgaged to the hilt.
sentence.Network_cn: 詹姆斯已经透支到最大额度并把能抵押的都抵押上了。

sentence.Network_en: The house is mortgaged to the bank for twenty thousand dollars.
sentence.Network_cn: 这房子以两万美元押给银行.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the article 14 of Chinese Maritime Law and the first clause ( 5 ) of the article 180 of Chinese Property Law all stipulate that vessels under construction can be mortgaged .②我国《海商法》第14条以及《中华人民共和国物权法》（以下简称《物权法》)第180条第一款（五)都规定了建造中船舶可以设定抵押权。
transfer of ownership of the mortgaged ship ., 被抵押船舶转让.
Their plants , their equipment and inventories were mortgaged heavily ., 他们的厂房 , 设备和存货被大量用作抵押.
he mortgaged his house in order to start a business他把房子作抵押贷款以开办一家商店

list.abs: 房奴（mortgage slave）一词是教育部2007年8月公布的171个汉语新词之一。“房奴”意思为房屋的奴隶。
财务英语英汉对照表 (C) - MBA智库百科 ... chattel 动产 chattel mortgage 动产抵押 chattel mortgage bond 动产抵押债券.
股票术语_百度百科 ... 到期收益率 Yield to Maturity 抵押债券（mortgage bond） Mortgage Bond 断路器 Circuit Breakers.
次级房贷(subprime mortgage)是指对信用较差的借款人所承作的房贷，或以原有房屋贷款再融资的房屋贷款，因此违约风险较高，借 …

entry.def: A mortgage is a loan of money which you get from a bank or building society in order to buy a house.

example.tran: 房屋抵押贷款利率的提高

entry.def: If you mortgage your house or land, you use it as a guarantee to a company in order to borrow money from them.

example.ex: They had to mortgage their home to pay the bills.
example.tran: 他们不得不抵押房屋借贷来支付这些款项。

means.word_mean: 1. burdened with legal or financial obligations;

sentences.sentence: "his house, his business, indeed, his whole life was heavily mortgaged"
